column4: Hey guys, I'm not a Linux user. But I wanted to know some info on the advantages of using linux. Not for the sake of argument.. but for my information to make certain choices
Beyond the fact that it's free of course
it's a nicer environement for a programmer, all the tools are free, they're high quality, and they're very easy to setup and use (with apt-get etc)
maybe if you use linux you'd become a programmer!!!!!!! :P
if you do become a programmer, choose ruby, python's overrated ;)
